reviews.review: muy buen juego , una joya para pc
Um jogo com bons gráficos, uma história "de zumbi". Dá para se divertir por algumas horas.
A very good game to play with friends !

para pasar el rato esta genial,y mas si hay amigos con quien sobrevivir a una horda de zombies hambrientos de sangre...
this games is cool as game

El juego de por sí esta genial, un clásico de Valve, tiene acción, los personajes son carismáticos, los ambientes tienen un detalle aceptable para la época y los zombies son impresionantes tanto por venir en hordas como por los especiales por sus habilidades y música característica. Para pasar un buen rato solo o con amigos. La única contra es que el 2 es una versión mejorada y extendida de la primera versión, por lo tanto recomedaría más el segundo.
Sad to see the game isn't as lively as it used to be, tons of hackers and junk that ruins the versus mode of it. But still a fun time. :)
I like this game because you have mission to do and you can play with friends. What i dislike about the game is : not so many maps to enjoy the game..
这个游戏简直妙不可言
Играть была давно выпущена но в 2020 она еще актуальна, четкая игра

Ребята я провёл чудесных 11 лет в этой прекрасной вселенной Left 4 Dead 1 она мне предоставила не забываемые эмоции !!!! Очень жаль что молодая поколения предпочитают Left 4 Dead 2 а не Left 4 Dead 1 (

Can't say much more from what's already been said, it's a FPS where the objective is to get to safehouses and ultimately escape the area. You can choose one of 4 survivors, but AFAIK, they're just skins. It has various types of zombies and each have more or less their own strategy. There isn't too much of a story, basically, it's about a group of survivors 2 weeks after the infection of a disease that isn't your average zombie outbreak, instead, people aren't dead, just severely sick and the group has to escape to safety, the thing I personally don't understand is if the campaigns are tied to one another, the 1st and 2nd seem so, but I honestly don't know, also, read the graffiti in the safehouses, they kinda give off some lore.

If there's one "warning" I could give is that this is very much a multiplayer game, sure, you can play the campaigns offline and have fun with it no problem at all, but the game still leans towards playing online with other people, so take that as you will, but yea, this is aimed towards multiplayer, if I knew this beforehand, I MAYBE (just maybe) wouldn't have gotten it, even if the game is pretty good nonetheless
Great game very fun and awesome gameplay epic game
This game is awesome and it is very epic,
Can't believe I haven't played this game sooner. It's still fun and some people still play it online.

Un juego muy "divertido" en lo que a machacar Zombies se refiere,ademas,te permite añadirle infinidad de "Mods" o "Extensiones" al juego lo que lo hace mucho más entretenido...
Contiene muchísimos modos de juego y mapas,con diferentes dificultades seleccionables...
También algo que hay que mencionar es su "IA",es decir,su "Inteligencia Artificial",la cual se nota que esta muy trabajada en lo que a compañeros y zombies se refiere.

Muy buen juego sin duda,totalmente recomendado.

Fun, and actually more polished than L4D2, less animation glitches and just less obnoxious. L4D2 is still great due to it's offical Steam Controller Support and Workshop filled to the brim with user created mods.

Left 4 Dead это командный зомби-шутер от 1-го лица.Для меня этого было достаточно что-бы я её купил.Сама игра завязана на том что вы,с вашими друзьями (или ботами) убиваете зомбей и проходите дальше.Но если поставить максимальный уровень сложности,начнётся боль...
